TopicTitle: All "Explore..." contracts unlocker or a mega contract to replace them

Articles.Content:
I'm doing my space program all wrong it seems,

Sometimes i get the "Explore Minmus" contract, sometimes i don't.

But now i decided i want to send a probe to Moho. Does that contract even exist in the game ?

So basically here are my suggestions:

-A mod that would make available all the "Explore x" contracts, those that never expire when activated.

Or

-One huge contract to Rule. Them. All.

Interesting suggestion. As you might see in

, it is possible to "skip ahead" and explore bodies even when not told to, and the missions would update accordingly to include planting flags or exploring further bodies... but the relevant explore mission might be forever denied for that playthrough...

One thing that video doesn't show though, is that perhaps (I'm not sure) if you enter the SOI of a body but not yet got into orbit with it, perhaps you might be able to grab the relevant explore mission from the mission center?

Edited October 24, 2014 by Spheniscine

Explore contract spawning appears to be buggy ATM.

1) Save your game on the Space Center screen (make a unique save)

2) Alt-F12, Contracts, Add; click on "H" button at ExploreBody contract. Hit it several times if you want a multi-contract mission (like Duna-Ike or Eve-Gilly).

3) Go to mission control and look at what spawned. If you like it - accept, if you don't - load your save and repeat p.2.

Note that you can get a multiple contracts for one body by spawning them that way; just reload your save and gamble again.

just reload your save and gamble again.

Yup i tried it. I only gave me the ones i already had: Duna, Ike, Minmus...

I'll retry when i reach Minmus later tonight.

Yup i tried it. I only gave me the ones i already had: Duna, Ike, Minmus...

I'll retry when i reach Minmus later tonight.

Yeah, it seems that you can get only 3 or so planets to explore at any moment. Complete them to unlock more.

All the planets contracts should pop up based upon when good launch windows appear. The game can use something like the launch window planner, and if the delta v is below XXXX in Y months, then the contracts should start appearing, along with the date range of the good window.

Yeah, it seems that you can get only 3 or so planets to explore at any moment. Complete them to unlock more.

I guess moons count too.

I've got Eve, Duna, and Ike contracts... I want a Moho contract, because my ship is already on the way, and it will get there before my ion probes to duna and eve.

Will I not get the explore contract if I get some science data, but don't do the landing?
